body:
@herrjemand Haven't seen these particular errors before, can you try off a clean clone just running these commands and nothing else, I just verified this process worked on my machine ðŸ‘ 

```bash
# Clone here
python script/bootstrap.py -v --dev
python script/build.py -c D
```

@MarshallOfSound 

Here is what I am getting now:


@herrjemand What version of visual studio do you have / is it fully up to date?

vs2015 up to date
